name: Golf2D
description:
This is a remake of TairaGames's golf game. there was some things that i didnt like in it so i wanted to se if i could remake it. so i did. it's not very polished and there are alot of things i could fix but im busy with school right now so i'll fix it as fast as i can.

if you need any programming help you could hit me up on: MonsrudGames@gmail.com. TairaGames's Youtube channel:   https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC16wQrBg9UVlWa6aGBd9q-w
